bigger_coops.name: Bigger Coops
bigger_coops.description: Your dinosaurs are living in crowded, dirty conditions. Buy a bigger coop so you can make more dinosaurs live in crowded and dirty conditions.

descriptive_upgrades.name: Better Upgrade descriptions
descriptive_upgrades.description: Upgrades now tell you their precise effects, with like numbers and everything. This was originally going to be free but it was a pain to code so screw you, you have to work for it.

data.name: Eggcell Spreadsheets
data.description: Turns out the bar at the top with all scary abbreviations was actually useful. Whoulda thunk?

autosellers.name: Hire Egg Merchant
autosellers.description: Employ professional traders to sell your eggs for you. Sure, they can't tell eggs apart and they aren't very fast. But they're professionals alright.

sell_100.name: Eggs In The Trunk
sell_100.description: Your current strategy of carrying eggs and running with them to the market is proving ineffecient. A friend has this totally rad car and she's like, down to give you a ride whenever you need it, maaaaaan.

sell_all.name: Eggs In The Truck
sell_all.description: A friend told you about this really big car that can like, carry tons of eggs. You still don't believe her but it's worth a shot.
